item.title: The Good, the Bad, and the Ugly About ServiceNow from a Developer's Perspective
item.description: Over the years, the concept of “platform” has been growing and become one of the main topics regarding IT Service Management. ServiceNow is one company in particular that has become a big thing in this space. Sure, the list of companies using the ServiceNow platform is impressive, but it doesn’t show how many people are actually using or familiar with the platform. What really brought this to my attention is when I mention ServiceNow while talking to people working in big companies.
